name: Stoopid Hamster Game
description:
Find the way back to the hamster cage at the end of the level.

Gain momentum with ragdoll to tumble the Hamster wheel.

Jump and use lifts to navigate the level.

Created solo by me (Luke Lawrence) Using Unreal Engine and Blender.

Made over the week of the Jam for UOC GAMEJAM 2022.

Only Sounds are sourced from Mixkit.com.
